document.discussion_title: The Palmer School Presents Free Skills Acquisition Program for 2016 Summer (August) | Xpino Media Network
document.topic_text: Precious Ikpoza - Wednesday, August 3, 2016 The Palmer School Presents Free Skills Acquisition Program for 2016 Summer (August) You can be equipped with income-making opportunities in times of economic hardship. The Palmer School Ikorodu hereby makes it possible for housewives, unemployed graduates, young school leavers, people in salary employment and the general public to gain money-making skills in the 2016 summer Entrepreneurial Workshop entitled: MONEY-MAKING & ENTREPRENEURIAL OPPORTUNITIES DURING ECONOMIC DOWNTURN The following are available courses/fields : 1.Marketing: Leveraging on Social media for Widescope marketing 2.Agric: Wealth Opportunities in Agric Valu-Chains, Mass Planting of Plantain, Tomato Planting, Ugu, etc. 3. SME: Hands-on Trainings on Production of Lunch-Box, Purse and Anniversary Souvenirs, Production of TOT bags, Ankara Shoes & Bags, Production & Packaging of Bed-Sheets, Pillow Case, throw Pillows, Curtains etc. 4.Economic Blue-Print beyond 2016 5.Sourcing for Fund for your Biz Start Up Venue: The Palmer School Compound, 3 Alhaja Jimoh Street, Off Ogunbanke Street, Laspotech’s 1st Gate, Ikorodu, Lagos. Date: August 13, 2016 NOTE: Registration is free. Last date for registration is August 9, 2016. To register or book a place, call/text 08034362456 , 08022278111 , 08055222456 or 08067339780. You can also visit our Facebook page to register. CLICK REGISTER at
